message: I also tried django_extensions dumpscript without success.

Does anyone have recommendations on how to export and import the auth? Exporting a fixture is easy. However trying to import the fixture into a new database fails with Integrity errors. I've tried importing individual models auth.user, auth.groups, auth.permissions and contentypes with no success.
Have you tried using the -n (--natural) argument?
I didn't work in the current state of the db but the import may work if I load those first before the apps data. I have a work around I'm using for now. Thanks @fabianbuechler

@citadelgrad, you're welcome. In case you want some docs on this: https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/dev/topics/serialization/#natural-keys and https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/dev/ref/django-admin/#django-admin-option---natural might be helpful.
